articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Workers, Technicians and Officials of Sangwon Cement Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Workers, Technicians and Officials of Sangwon Cement Complex
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), sent a congratulatory message to the workers, technicians and officials of the Sangwon Cement Complex on January 17.
					 He in the message sent warm congratulations and militant salute to all the workers, technicians and officials of the complex who surpassed last year the peak year in production of cement on behalf of the first secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Last year our soldier-builders, workers and youth built the Sci-Tech Complex, Mirae Scientists Street, Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, Chongchongang Power Station in Tiers and other grand monumental structures in different parts of the country in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu under the leadership of the party. They thus ushered in a great era of the country's prosperity by doing ten years' work in just one year, bringing about the dramatic change in the appearance of the country.
					
					 These gigantic changes and creations reflect the ardent patriotic loyalty of you who have waged a devoted drive day and night to produce even one ton of more cement, sharing thought and intention with the party and overcoming whatever difficulties with the indomitable will.
					
					 The laudable success made by the complex reinforces the belief that the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to render the DPRK thoroughly isolated, ratchet up sanctions and pressure will never work on us as long as it has Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's heroic working class struggling, considering the unshakable revolutionary spirit of Paektu and principle of giving priority to self-development as an invincible weapon and only the glorious road of Chollima, the path of Mallima will be in store for us in the future, too.
					
					 You should defend the revolution and present a proud labor gift to the Seventh Congress of the WPK by boosting the production of cement this year, too, by keeping the spirit which surged in the campaign last year.
					
					 A meeting conveying the congratulatory message took place on the spot on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., WPK, officials concerned, officials and salaried staff of the complex.

articles.title: Congratulations to Congress of LPRP
articles.content:
Congratulations to Congress of LPRP
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Monday sent a congratulatory message to the 10th Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					 The message expressed the belief that the congress would mark an important occasion in the activities of the party to increase the leadership role of the party, consolidate the people's democratic system and develop the country's economy. 
					
					 In the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the parties and peoples of the two countries developing day by day on good terms under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries would steadily grow stronger, it sincerely wished the congress great success in its work.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meeting of C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Held
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The 60th enlarged plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held here on Monday.
					 Members of the C.C., the youth league and its officials in Pyongyang and local areas attended the meeting.
					
					 It discussed the issue of devotedly carrying out the militant tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the New Year Address serves as a signpost of struggle and advance for making the country dash forward  higher and faster to usher in the new era of Chollima, era of Mallima and important guidelines indicating a short-cut to the final victory in building a thriving nation.
					
					 They underscored the need to glorify the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as one of victors and glory.
					
					 They said that they should firmly prepare the youth as strong pillars for the country, bearing deep in mind the trust the party reposed in them as masters of the youth power and let them work miracles and emerge young heroes in each campaign site for building a thriving nation.
					
					 They stressed the need to fully display the honorable mission and duty as young vanguard in the era of Songun in the general advance for ushering in the golden age for building a thriving nation this year.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of 70th Founding Anniversary of Youth League Tour Different Places
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of 70th Founding Anniversary of Youth League Tour Different Places
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League toured different places of Pyongyang.
					 They visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site where arms of Songun were produced first. It is associated with the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung who chose the site for the first munitions factory after the liberation of the country and indicated an untrodden path for the development of the munitions industry.
					
					 At the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War, they went round the supreme command post and other places telling about the feats the President performed by leading the war to victory.
					
					 They also visited the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Being briefed on the museum built thanks to the intense loyalty and sense of moral obligation of Marshal Kim Jong Un, they looked round the halls and outdoor exhibition.
					
					 They looked round the venue of the photo exhibition marking the 70th anniversary of the youth league.

articles.title: Stamps Published to Mark Anniversary of Youth League
articles.content:
Stamps Published to Mark Anniversary of Youth League
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued a stamp (a sheet) on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Seen on the upper part of the sheet are letters "70th founding anniversary of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League" and "Juche 35 (1946)-Juche 105 (2016)" and a youth league badge.
					
					 The stamp displays a portrait badge written with the letters "Chongnyon Jonwi", illustrated with the portraits of the smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Students Qualified for 40th ICPC
articles.content:
DPRK Students Qualified for 40th ICPC
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Students of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK won a trophy, two gold prizes and two speed prizes in the Asian regional preliminaries to get qualification for the 40th ICPC (International College Programming Contest) to be held this year.
					 Taking part in the preliminaries, divided into 200-odd groups, were more than 600 students from at least 120 universities.
					
					 In the preliminary contest each group had to solve the ten questions in five hours and its standings were decided according to which group solved more questions in speed and correctness.
					
					 The chairperson of the Asian regional contest organizing committee said Kim Il Sung University has a high capability, expressing the hope to attend an international academic symposium in the DPRK to be held on the occasion of its 70th anniversary.
					
					 The achievement made by students of Kim Il Sung University gives a glimpse of the vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of attaching importance to science and talents.

articles.title: Ryangchaek Bearing Factory
articles.content:
Ryangchaek Bearing Factory
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Ryangchaek Bearing Factory is one of those taking the lead in a drive to develop products on the basis of locally available materials in the DPRK.
					 In recent years alone, the factory has steadily upgraded its production process while developing scores of kinds of products by its own efforts.
					
					 And a number of technical renovations have resulted in further improving the indices of bearings like solidity, wear resistance and fatigue strength.
					
					 Now, employees of the factory have turned out in the general offensive to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor achievements, in hearty response to the call made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.

articles.title: Officials in Field of Forest Restoration and Land and Environment Protection Meet
articles.content:
Officials in Field of Forest Restoration and Land and Environment Protection Meet
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of officials in the field of forest restoration and land and environment protection at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Thae Jong Su and chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, organs of armed forces, party and power organs here and in local areas and officials in the field of forest restoration and land and environment protection.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the successes and lessons gained in the forest restoration campaign and general mobilization for land management and discussed the measures for achieving greater successes in the work this year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.
					
					 The participants watched a video dealing with the forest restoration campaign last year.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers underscored the need to build nurseries to put the sapling production on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis and manage well the sci-tech rooms and establish the system for disseminating the advanced technologies to solve the issues arising in the forest restoration campaign by dint of science and technology.
					
					 The participants watched a video dealing with the general mobilization for land management last year.

articles.title: Idea of By Our Nation Itself Is Vital to Reunification of Korea: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Idea of By Our Nation Itself Is Vital to Reunification of Korea: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The idea of By Our Nation Itself is vital to the movement for the reunification of Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The issue of reunifying Korea is not the matter of settling the contradiction among Koreans but that of putting an end to the outside forces' moves for aggression against the Korean nation.
					
					 The idea of By Our Nation Itself requires all Koreans to reject and oppose sycophancy and dependence on the outsiders and maintain a steadfast stand on national independence.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persistently follow the U.S. which escalates the tension in the Korean Peninsula, stretching its tentacles of interference to south Korea whenever there is a sign of improving the inter-Korean relations, it is impossible to achieve the national reconciliation and unity and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have been put on the altar of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK due to the south Korean conservative ruling forces who regard sycophancy and dependence on the outsiders as a mode of their existence.
					
					 They should cooperate with the compatriots, not with the outsiders, in order to achieve national reunification and prosperity.
					
					 No one can match the Korean nation when it goes united close as it is a homogenous one with one and the same history. This is proven by the history of the development of the inter-Korean relations which witnessed the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					  No force can replace the Korean nation in achieving its reunification.
					
					 The Koreans should be a main player in the struggle for achieving the reunification of the country, guided by the idea of By Our Nation Itself as they stake their destiny on the reunification and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Moving to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Moving to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Jan. 12 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for their confrontation racket against the DPRK.
					 The hostile forces, taken aback by the DPRK's first successful H-bomb test, are provoking it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's first H-bomb test is aimed at self-defence from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. has turned south Korea into its nuclear outpost in wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement in the 1950s.
					
					 It has deployed many nuclear weapons in its military bases in south Korea.
					
					 So, it has no justifications to slander the DPRK's H-bomb test.
					
					 The DPRK is watching the hostile provocations by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers and will take corresponding measures.
					
					 The statement condemned the provocations of the hostile forces against the DPRK and demanded the U.S. stop deploying weapons in south Korea and withdraw its forces from south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage War Drill
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The 35th Division of the south Korean army announced that it would stage a mid-winter training in North Jolla Province from Jan. 18 to 29, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 They described the drill as one to cope with "additional provocation" by someone.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Vow to Struggle for Solution to Issue of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Vow to Struggle for Solution to Issue of Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea held an inaugural ceremony in Seoul on Jan. 14, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. 
					 Victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army spoke at the ceremony.
					
					 They said:
					
					 When they urged the "government" to solve the issue of sexual slavery, it was not just to hear such irresponsible clinch of the deal as what it did recently.
					
					 Japan claims it has fulfilled the responsibility for reparation by paying a petty amount of money, but the victims can never accept deceptive money of consolation, not legal apology and reparation. 
					
					 A declaration was read out at the ceremony.
					
					 It said the "agreement" was totally null and void as it failed to reflect the demands of the victims and aiding groups at all.
					
					 It underlined the need to stage again for the just solution of the issue of sexual slavery and urge the Japanese government to recognize the criminal acts, make a clear and official apology and reparation, probe the truth and conduct proper education in history, etc.
					
					 A written request to the "government" was read out at the ceremony.
					
					 The participants marched as far as the foreign ministry to thrust it to the ministry.

articles.title: S. Korean Group of Traitors Accused of Patronizing Japan's Arrogant Attitude
articles.content:
S. Korean Group of Traitors Accused of Patronizing Japan's Arrogant Attitude
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are patronizing Japan which refuses to make proper apology and reparation for the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, touching off resentment of public at home and abroad.
					 A spokesman for the south Korean foreign ministry was busy patronizing the impudent stand of Japan before reporters on Jan. 12 that the Japanese chief executive made an apology through the then foreign minister when the "agreement" was made on Dec. 28 last year and said words of apology and reparation in a phone conversation with the "president".
					
					 Japan finally refused to admit the state and legal responsibility and apology for the past sexual slavery with such ambiguous words as the "army's involvement" and "keen feeling of responsibility" at the negotiations with the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed in Finland
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting hailing the New Year Address of supreme leader Kim Jong Un in Helsinki on January 6. 
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the Finnish Communists' League, the Finland-Korea Society and the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and other people. 
					
					 Juha Kieksi, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said: 
					
					 The DPRK has access to the strongest military deterrent capable of firmly defending the sovereignty of the country from the imperialists' moves to stifle it and has achieved miraculous successes in the drive for building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Korean people have turned out in the drive to carry out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and greet the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor feats. 
					
					 They are working hard to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 The Finnish progressives will intensify the movement for supporting the just cause of the Korean people. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Men of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific Regional Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Men of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Asia-Pacific regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising the Great Men of Mt. Paektu was formed on January 8.
					 Former prime minister of Nepal Madav Kumar Nepal and Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education in Indonesia, were elected honorary chairpersons of the preparatory committee.
					
					 Peter Woods, co-chairperson of the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and the chairman of the National Party of Pakistan were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to let the whole world know the desire and will of the progressive people to accomplish the cause of global independence as wished by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il through diverse activities for praising them in different countries of the region and introduce the reality of the DPRK achieving amazing progress under the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Supported by Arab Regional Body
articles.content:
DPRK Supported by Arab Regional Body
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Arab Committee for Solidarity with Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea in a statement on Jan. 10 praised the DPRK's first H-bomb test as a great deed of protecting the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the world.
					 The statement said that the U.S. and the Western countries are talking about sanctions and retaliation against the DPRK. It went on:
					
					 The U.S. and the Western countries should stop hostile policy toward the DPRK and respect its sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea to keep peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and make south Korea pull down the concrete wall at once.
					
					 Also the U.S. should unconditionally come to term with a fair and reasonable proposal of the DPRK to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.

articles.title: Feats of Great Men for Strengthening Defence Capability Praised by German Body
articles.content:
Feats of Great Men for Strengthening Defence Capability Praised by German Body
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its internet website an article titled "Undying feats devoted to strengthening defence capability" hailing the success of the DPRK's first H-bomb test on January 11. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Early in the 1960s President Kim Il Sung said one could defend sovereignty only when one simultaneously builds up the economy and defence even though one has to tighten one's belt more. 
					
					 In the 1990s when the Korean people were forced to undergo the Arduous March owing to the imperialists' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK and repeated natural disasters, leader Kim Jong Il resolutely kept to the road of Songun for bolstering up the defence capabilities. 
					
					 In the course the Korean people successfully conducted two underground nuclear tests in 2006 and 2009 to accomplish the great national historic feats of becoming a nuclear weapons state. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un set out the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force at the plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in March, 2013. 
					
					 In less than three years since the new line was set out the explosion of the first H-bomb test in the DPRK jolted the world. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK upon the historic event highly praise Kim Jong Un for guaranteeing the ever-lasting future of the Korean nation while glorifying the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Three Charters for National Reunification Hailed by Argentinean Party
articles.content:
Three Charters for National Reunification Hailed by Argentinean Party
Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Argentina on January 6 posted on internet bulletin on international affairs an article saying that the three charters for national reunification are the programme for reunification common to the Korean nation whose truth and actuality have been proven. 
					 The article went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo put forward by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification. 
					
					 He provided two inter-Korean summits, the first of its kind in the history of Korea's division, and made sure that the June 15 joint declaration and its practical programme October 4 declaration were adopted. 
					
					 This helped the three charters for national reunification fully prove their position and nature as a programme for reunification common to the Korean nation. 
					
					 After the historic north-south joint declarations were adopted the whole Korean nation opened up an avenue to reunification shoulder-to-shoulder, thereby bringing about such stirring events as brisk dialogues and contacts, the re-linking of railways and roads, repatriation of unconverted long-term prisoners and the reunion of separated families and relatives. These facts showed the vitality of the three charters common to the nation, both in name and in reality. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respect the three charters for national reunification, which were confirmed to be a programme common to the nation at north-south agreements, and respond to the nationwide discussion of the way of realizing them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, emitio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion a los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del Complejo de Cemento de Sangwon.
					La misiva senala que envia una calurosa felicitacion y saludo combativo en nombre del Primer Secretario del PTC a todos los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del Complejo que el ano pasado rompieron el nivel del ano de produccion maxima.
					
					Prosigue que en 2015 los constructores militares, obreros y jovenes, bajo la direccion del PTC, levantaron a lo largo del pais grandes creaciones monumentales, entre ellas, el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnologia, el Reparto Mirae para los Cientificos, la Central Hidroelectrica Jovenes Heroes Paektusan, las Centrales Hidroelectricas Escalonadas Chongchongang, con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu, asi que abrieron la gran epoca de la prosperidad de la patria en que los rios y los montes cambian su fisonomia en un dia acortando el tiempo.
					
					Subraya que en tales cambios y creaciones estan impregnados el patriotismo y la fidelidad de los empleados del Complejo quienes se abnegaron dia y noche por producir mas aunque sea una tonelada de cemento superando las dificultades con la inflexible voluntad en pleno acato a la idea y el proposito del Partido.
					
					Destaca que los exitos orgullosos logrados por el Complejo redoblan la conviccion de que mientras exista la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que lucha tomando como arma invencible el rojo espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y el lema de dar prioridad a sus propias fuerzas, las atroces maniobras del aislamiento, sancion y presion de los imperialistas yanquis y las fuerzas satelites no surtiran ningun efecto en la RPDC y en el futuro tambien ante ella abrira solo el camino de la gloria.
					
					Apunta la necesidad de salvaguardar la revolucion y preparar el orgulloso regalo laboral dedicado al VII Congreso del PTC al producir mucho mas el cemento este ano tambien poniendo en pleno auge el impetu redoblado en el ano pasado.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en el terreno la ceremonia de entrega del mensaje de felicitacion.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del PTC, los funcionarios y empleados de la rama interesada y del Complejo arriba citado.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de 60a sesion plenaria del CC de UJS
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion ampliada de 60a sesion plenaria del CC de UJS
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en esta capital la reunion ampliada de 60a sesion plenaria del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung con la participacion de los miembros del Comite Central de la UJS y funcionarios de los comites centrales y locales de la UJS. 
					El foro discutio sobre el tema de materializar cabalmente las tareas combativas presentadas en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2016 del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de UJS, Jon Yong Nam, presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal es hoja de ruta que permite a la patria abrir una nueva era de Chollima, la de Mallima y sirve de guia programatica que ilumina el atajo a la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					Subrayaron la necesidad de acoger el VII Congreso del PTC como conclave de triunfadores y de gloria. 
					
					Expusieron la decision de formar a los jovenes como pilares del pais aptos para apoyar a la patria, y creadores de milagros y heroes jovenes en los campos de construccion de un Estado prospero, guardando la confianza del partido que les presenta como protagonistas de la potencia de la juventud. 
					
					Manifestaron la voluntad de cumplir con la honrosa mision y deber de vanguardias juveniles de la era del Songun en la marcha general de este ano significativo por abrir la era dorada de la construccion de un Estado prospero.

articles.title: CC de PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion a X Congreso de PPRL
articles.content:
CC de PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion a X Congreso de PPRL
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion al X Congreso del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao.
					La misiva expresa una confianza de que el Congreso sera un motivo importante en las actividades del PPRL para fortalecer el papel directivo del partido, consolidar mas el regimen democratico popular y desarrollar la economia del pais.
					
					Convencida de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y pueblos de ambos paises, que se desarrollan cada dia mas favorablemente bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos lideres de los dos paises, se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran invariablemente tambien en el futuro, desea de todo corazon grandes exitos en los trabajos del Congreso.

articles.title: Reunion de funcionarios de rama de reforestacion y proteccion territorial y ambiental
articles.content:
Reunion de funcionarios de rama de reforestacion y proteccion territorial y ambiental
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion de los funcionarios de la rama de restauracion forestal y de proteccion territorial y ambiental.
					Participaron Pak Pong Ju, O Su Yong, Ro Tu Chol, Thae Jong Su, los secretarios jefes de los Comites Provinciales del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios del Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, organismos de las fuerzas armadas, instituciones centrales y locales del partido y el Poder, y de la rama de reforestacion y de proteccion territorial y ambiental. 
					
					En el foro se analizaron y se balancearon los exitos y lecciones adquiridos en la campana de restauracion forestal y en la movilizacion general de administracion territorial y se discutieron las medidas para alcanzar mayores exitos en este ano en que se celebrara el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Se proyecto una videocinta que muestra la campana de restauracion forestal del ano pasado. 
					
					Escucharon el informe del vicepremier Kim Yong Jin e intervenciones. 
					
					Los oradores dieron enfasis en la necesidad de construir las almacigas en el principio de elevar el nivel cientifico, industrial e intensivo de produccion de posturas, acondicionar bien las salas de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas y establecer el sistema de propaganda de las tecnologias avanzadas para solucionar todos los problemas pendientes apoyandose en las ciencias y tecnicas. 
					
					Los participantes vieron la videocinta que muestra el estado de la movilizacion general para la administracion territorial realizada el ano pasado.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre Mina Carbonifera Juventud 8 de Febrero de Jikdong
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre Mina Carbonifera Juventud 8 de Febrero de Jikdong
Pyongyang, 18 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, estudio en el terreno las labores de la Mina Carbonifera Juventud 8 de Febrero de Jikdong del Complejo Carbonifero Juventud de la zona de Sunchon.
					Tras reconocer el estado de explotacion de la mina, recorrio los campos de trabajo de la galeria no.6 para analizar concretamente el estado de mecanizacion del trabajo y de perforacion, la capacidad de transporte de carbon y otros.
					
					Felicito a los exitos laborales de los carboneros quienes cumplen en 150% el plan diario y los estimulo para que ellos logren mayores exitos en la produccion de carbon en acato al proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Enfatizo la necesidad de aumentar la produccion de carbon, alimento de la industria, en acato al proposito del partido de registrar nuevo viraje en el desarrollo de la economia del pais y el mejoramiento de vida del pueblo concentrando todas las fuerzas en la edificacion de la potencia economica.
					
					En la reunion consultiva sostenida sobre el terreno fueron discutidos los problemas para acelerar la mecanizacion combinada de los trabajos en la galeria y prestar atencion a la clasificacion de carbon y otros que se presentan en el aumento de la produccion carbonifera.
